verses.verse: We give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to you, <S%H430><s%> God. We give thanks, <S%H3034><s%> for your Name <S%H8034><s%> is near. <S%H7138><s%> Men tell <S%H5608><s%> about your wondrous works. <S%H6381><s%>
When I choose <S%H3947><s%> the appointed <S%H4150><s%> time, <S%H8199><s%> I will judge blamelessly. <S%H4339><s%>
The earth <S%H776><s%> and all its inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> quake. <S%H4127><s%> I firmly hold <S%H8505><s%> its pillars. <S%H5982><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
I said <S%H559><s%> to the arrogant, <S%H1984><s%> "Don't <S%H1984><s%> boast!" I said to the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> "Don't <S%H7311><s%> lift up the horn. <S%H7161><s%>
Don't <S%H7311><s%> lift up your horn <S%H7161><s%> on high. <S%H4791><s%> Don't <S%H1696><s%> speak with a stiff <S%H6277><s%> neck. <S%H6677><s%>"
For neither from the east, <S%H4161><s%> nor from the west, <S%H4628><s%> nor yet from the south, <S%H4057><s%> comes exaltation. <S%H7311><s%>
But God <S%H430><s%> is the judge. <S%H8199><s%> He puts down <S%H8213><s%> one, <S%H7311><s%> and lifts up another.

For in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> there is a cup, <S%H3563><s%> full of foaming <S%H2560><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> mixed <S%H4538><s%> with spices. <S%H4392><s%> He pours it <S%H2088><s%> out. <S%H5064><s%> Indeed the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> drink <S%H4680><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> it to its very dregs. <S%H8105><s%>
But I will declare <S%H5046><s%> this forever: <S%H5769><s%> I will sing praises <S%H2167><s%> to the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
I will cut off all the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> but the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be lifted up. <S%H7311><s%>
